name: MUTZ
description:
Mutz is a village in the outskirts of Mutapa Kingdom. One day it got attacked by monsters from nowhere which they called "wuma" (ghouls). Its now all up to a young warrior who was left in the village when a few days back, all men were summoned to the castle for the installment of a new king. With the help of a spirit voice he must save his Village. 

Please Enjoy, Like, Comment and Support us.

 Thank you
